thread.section_title: Snowgoose Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Snowgoose | snowgoose.com.au
thread.title: Jennifer Saunders

author: Jennifer Saunders
title: Jennifer Saunders
text: I have been using Snowgoose for several years and have never had a bad experience. The fruit (and other treats, if ordered) come stunningly packed in a wooden crate with wood wool and the fruit is the very best available. The cherries at Christmas are a particularly good product and have become a family institution. Delivery is always on time and exactly as requested. They also deliver to smaller areas. It surprises me that they need so little notice for an order. I cannot recommend Snowgoose too highly.
